parameterdescription.para: Check if file is readable, so if file exists !

briefdescription.para: File C++ (associated to Stock_Write_Dynspec_Data_Part.h) for stock process parameters (for rebinning the data) and write data Matrix for the ICD6's Dynspec Groups.

detaileddescription.para: Overview: Functions stockDynspecData and writeDynspecData are described (programmed) here. The first one (stockDynspecData) will take as parameter processing parameters and stok them as private attributes. The second function (writeDynspecData) will write them in the hdf5 output file (in the corresponding dynspec). Data processing is coded here !!
